STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: if( true == g_selectStage:GetIsActiveDeleteConfirmEditBox() ) then Button = UISelf:GetControl("BTN_DO_DELETE") Button:SetEnable(true); else Button = UISelf:GetControl("BTN_DO_DELETE") Button:SetEnable(false); end

EDIT.SCRIPT: local cust = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() if cust == 0 then UISelf:SetEditFocus(true) UISelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(1) end
EDIT.HOTKEY: local kParent = UISelf:GetParent() local kDeleteBtn = kParent:GetControl("BTN_DO_DELETE") if true == kDeleteBtn:GetEnable() then g_selectStage:CallDeleteCharacterIfAble(UISelf) end return true
CloseUI("DeleteConfirm", true) CloseUI("BarrierForDeleteConfirm", true) return true
CloseUI("DeleteConfirm", true) CloseUI("BarrierForDeleteConfirm", true) return true

STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: UISelf:SetModal(true) local slf = UISelf local dlt = GetUIWnd("DeleteConfirm") if false==dlt:IsNil() then slf:SetLocation(Point2(dlt:GetLocation():GetX()+3, dlt:GetLocation():GetY())) end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: PlaySoundByID( "Staff_attk_04" ) g_selectStage:DeleteCharacterIfAble(UISelf) CloseUI("AskOneMoreDeleteConfirm", true) CloseUI("DeleteConfirm", true) CloseUI ("BarrierForDeleteConfirm", true)
BUTTON.HOTKEY: PlaySoundByID( "Staff_attk_04" ) g_selectStage:DeleteCharacterIfAble(UISelf) CloseUI("AskOneMoreDeleteConfirm", true) CloseUI("DeleteConfirm", true) CloseUI ("BarrierForDeleteConfirm", true) return true

PlaySoundByID( "Staff_attk_04" ) g_selectStage:DeleteCharacterIfAble(UISelf) CloseUI("AskOneMoreDeleteConfirm", true) CloseUI("DeleteConfirm", true) CloseUI ("BarrierForDeleteConfirm", true) return true

BUTTON.SCRIPT: CloseUI("AskOneMoreDeleteConfirm", true) CloseUI("DeleteConfirm", true) CloseUI("BarrierForDeleteConfirm", true)
BUTTON.HOTKEY: CloseUI("AskOneMoreDeleteConfirm", true) CloseUI("DeleteConfirm", true) CloseUI("BarrierForDeleteConfirm", true) return true

CloseUI("WrongInputDeleteConfirm", true) CloseUI("BarrierForDeleteConfirm", true) return true
CloseUI("WrongInputDeleteConfirm", true) CloseUI("BarrierForDeleteConfirm", true) return true

FORM.SCRIPT: local strCharNode = nil if nil ~= g_CreateType then if g_CreateType == 0 then strCharNode = "char_root_create_1" elseif g_CreateType == 1 then strCharNode = "char_root_create_2" end else strCharNode = "char_root_create_1" end local kSize = UISelf:GetSize() UISelf:SetLocationByWorldNode(strCharNode, Point2(10-kSize:GetX()/2, 0) )

BUTTON.SCRIPT: if UISelf:IsMouseDown() == true then actor = g_selectStage:GetNewActor() if actor:IsNil() == false then actor:IncRotate(0.08) end end
if UISelf:IsMouseDown() == true then actor = g_selectStage:GetNewActor() if actor:IsNil() == false then actor:IncRotate(-0.08) end end

FORM.SCRIPT: local kMenu = GetUIWnd("SFRM_CHAR_MENU") if nil~=kMenu and kMenu:IsNil()==false then local kPos = UISelf:GetLocation() local kMenuPos = kMenu:GetLocation() UISelf:SetLocation( Point2(kMenuPos:GetX()-45, kPos:GetY()) ) end

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: PlaySound("../Sound/U_Sound/button(rollover).wav") local UIPush = UISelf:GetControl("FRM_PUSH_IMG") if not UIPush:IsNil() and not UIPush:IsVisible() then SelectClassCardEvent(UISelf, "FRM_OVER_IMG", true) SelectClassCardEvent(UISelf, "FRM_FRONT_IMG", false) end CallMutableToolTipText(GetTextW(400191), GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation())

FORM.SCRIPT: local kMenu = GetUIWnd("SFRM_CHAR_MENU") if nil~=kMenu and kMenu:IsNil()==false then local kPos = UISelf:GetLocation() local kMenuPos = kMenu:GetLocation() local iScreenY = GetScreenSize():GetY() UISelf:SetLocation( Point2(kMenuPos:GetX()-45, iScreenY-kMenu:GetSize():GetY()-UISelf:GetSize():GetY() ) ) end

EDIT.SCRIPT: local cust = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() if cust == 0 then UISelf:SetEditFocus(true) UISelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(1) end
userName = GetUserName() if userName:Length() ~= 0 then ClearEditFocus() end UISelf:SetEditFocus(true) SendScriptEvent("SFRM_CHAR_MENU", "BTN_CREATE_OK", "ON_L_BTN_UP")

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf if nil~=kSelf and kSelf:IsNil()==false then SelectGender(kSelf, 1) end
local kSelf = UISelf if nil~=kSelf and kSelf:IsNil()==false then SelectGender(kSelf, 2) end

FORM.SCRIPT: local kTemp = GetUIWnd("FRM_BACK_IMAGE") UISelf:SetLocation( Point2( kTemp:GetLocation():GetX()+kTemp:GetSize():GetX()+15, kTemp:GetLocation():GetY() ) )

LIST.SCRIPT:
local slf = UISelf if( CheckNil(g_world == nil) ) then return false end if( CheckNil(g_world:IsNil()) ) then return false end g_world:SetShowWorldFocusFilterColorAlpha( 0x00000000, 0.0, 0.5, 1.0, true, false ) local btn = CallUI("BTN_REALM_COMBINE_CANCLE") if true==btn:IsNil() then return end
local lstpos = slf:GetLocation() lstpos:SetX(slf:GetSize():GetX()+slf:GetLocation():GetX()) lstpos:SetY(66+slf:GetLocation():GetY()) btn:SetLocation(lstpos)

if( CheckNil(g_world == nil) ) then return false end if( CheckNil(g_world:IsNil()) ) then return false end g_world:SetShowWorldFocusFilterColorAlpha( 0x00000000, 0.5, 0.0, 1.0, false, false ) g_bIgnoreCombine = true SetCharSelectMenu(MENU_SELECT)

BUTTON.SCRIPT: CloseToolTip() selectedActorGuid = g_selectStage:GetSelectedActor() if selectedActorGuid:IsNil() then AddWarnDataStr(GetTextW(600015), 0) return true end g_selectStage:CallDeleteCharacterUI()
if(GetLocale() == LOCALE.NC_USA) then PlayMovie("2DIntro") else PlayMovie("opening") end

local MoveMgr = GetMovieMgr() local SelClassWnd = GetUIWnd("SelectClass") local iType = SelClassWnd:GetCustomDataAsInt() if 0 == iType then MoveMgr:Play("fighter") elseif 1 == iType then MoveMgr:Play("magician") elseif 2 == iType then MoveMgr:Play("archer") elseif 3 == iType then MoveMgr:Play("thief") elseif 50 == iType then MoveMgr:Play("thief") elseif 51 == iType then MoveMgr:Play("thief") end

STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: local kTemp = GetUIWnd("SelectClass") if nil~=kTemp and kTemp:IsNil() == false then UISelf:SetLocation( Point2( kTemp:GetLocation():GetX()+kTemp:GetSize():GetX()+15, kTemp:GetLocation():GetY() ) ) else UISelf:SetLocation(Point2( GetScreenSize():GetX()-15, 4 ) ) end

FORM.SCRIPT: CloseSelectCharactorUI() if( CheckNil(g_world == nil) ) then return false end if( CheckNil(g_world:IsNil()) ) then return false end g_world:SetShowWorldFocusFilterColorAlpha( 0x00000000, 0.0, 0.5, 1.0, true, false )
if( CheckNil(g_world == nil) ) then return false end if( CheckNil(g_world:IsNil()) ) then return false end g_world:SetShowWorldFocusFilterColorAlpha( 0x00000000, 0.5, 0.0, 1.0, false, false )

BUTTON.SCRIPT: PlaySound("../Sound/U_Sound/button(rollover).wav") local kMouseOver = UISelf:GetControl("FRM_MOUSE_OVER") if not kMouseOver:IsNil() then kMouseOver:Visible(true) end
local kMouseOver = UISelf:GetControl("FRM_MOUSE_OVER") if not kMouseOver:IsNil() then kMouseOver:Visible(false) end

g_SceneType = 0 g_CreateType = 0 LoadingSelectScene() PlaySoundByID( "cha-select-group" ) SetSelectCameraMove(g_kSelectCameraMode["CAMERA_MOVE_CREATE_HUMAN_IN"]) OffSelectUI() CloseUI("FRM_CHOICE_RACE")
PlaySound("../Sound/U_Sound/button(rollover).wav") local kMouseOver = UISelf:GetControl("FRM_MOUSE_OVER") if not kMouseOver:IsNil() then kMouseOver:Visible(true) end
local kMouseOver = UISelf:GetControl("FRM_MOUSE_OVER") if not kMouseOver:IsNil() then kMouseOver:Visible(false) end

if LOCALE.NC_KOREA == GetLocale() then g_SceneType = 0 g_CreateType = 1 LoadingSelectScene() PlaySoundByID( "cha-select-group" ) SetSelectCameraMove(g_kSelectCameraMode["CAMERA_MOVE_CREATE_DRAGON_IN"]) OffSelectUI() CloseUI("FRM_CHOICE_RACE") return end if true == g_selectStage:IsCreateNewRace() then g_SceneType = 0 g_CreateType = 1 LoadingSelectScene() PlaySoundByID( "cha-select-group" ) SetSelectCameraMove(g_kSelectCameraMode["CAMERA_MOVE_CREATE_DRAGON_IN"]) OffSelectUI() CloseUI("FRM_CHOICE_RACE") else AddWarnDataTT(791520) end
